price: 65. Dheh: Ma jiraan cid ku sugan samooyinka iyo arlada oo ogsoon Ghaybka (waxa qarsoon ee aan muuqan) Allaah ma’ahee, mana oga goorta la soo bixin.
arabic: قُل لَّا يَعۡلَمُ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yaʿlamu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi al-ghayba illā al-lahu wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
